mapper.select: SELECT MAX(group_id) as group_id FROM studygroup WHERE SUBSTRING(group_id, 1, 6) = #{yrmd};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO studygroup ( group_id, leader_id, title, name, study_desc, kind, status, mem_cnt, startdate, enddate, chk_m, chk_min_cnt, chk_total_cnt, penalty ) VALUES ( #{group_id}, #{leader_id}, #{title}, #{name}, #{study_desc}, #{kind}, 'STAT10', #{mem_cnt}, #{startdate}, #{enddate}, #{chk_m}, #{chk_min_cnt}, #{chk_total_cnt}, #{penalty} );
mapper.update: UPDATE studygroup SET title = #{title}, name = #{name}, study_desc = #{study_desc}, kind = #{kind}, status = #{status}, mem_cnt = #{mem_cnt}, startdate = #{startdate}, enddate = #{enddate}, chk_m = #{chk_m}, chk_min_cnt = #{chk_min_cnt}, chk_total_cnt = #{chk_total_cnt}, penalty = #{penalty} WHERE leader_id = #{leader_id} AND group_id = #{group_id}
mapper.select: SELECT A.group_id, A.leader_id, A.title, A.name, A.study_desc, A.kind, A.status, A.mem_cnt, A.startdate, A.enddate, A.view_cnt, A.chk_m, A.chk_min_cnt, A.chk_total_cnt, A.penalty, B.comm_cdnm status_nm FROM studygroup A JOIN code_d B ON A.status = B.comm_cd WHERE 1=1 AND (status LIKE 'STAT10' OR status LIKE 'STAT20') ORDER BY group_id desc;

SELECT A.group_id, A.leader_id, A.title, A.name, A.study_desc, A.kind, A.status, A.mem_cnt, A.startdate, A.enddate, A.view_cnt, A.chk_m, A.chk_min_cnt, A.chk_total_cnt, A.penalty, B.comm_cd status_nm FROM studygroup A JOIN code_d B ON A.status = B.comm_cd WHERE 1=1 AND title like '%'||#{title}||'%' AND (status LIKE 'STAT10' OR status LIKE 'STAT20') ORDER BY group_id desc;
